name: ARK
description: $ARK is a community-driven cryptocurrency created in response to the volatility and unreliability of many meme coins and low-utility tokens. Designed as a safe haven ( or 'ark') in the often chaotic world of crypto, $ARK emphasizes transparency, long-term value, and genuine utility. The project aims to provide stability, protect investors from scams and "rug pulls," and foster a strong, engaged community. With a focus on sustainable growth and decentralized principles, $ARK positions itself as a reliable option in an environment full of hype and speculation.
